statements: SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%generator%';
SELECT equipment_name, JSON_VALUE(performance_data, '$.efficiency') AS efficiency FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE JSON_VALUE(performance_data, '$.status') = 'operational';
SELECT maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_description, performance_data FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE performance_data ->> 'status' = 'completed';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM EquipmentMaintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE data_id > 100
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM PerformanceData GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(data_id) > 5
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer, purchase_date, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment LEFT JOIN PerformanceData ON Equipment.equipment_id = PerformanceData.equipment_id WHERE PerformanceData.maintenance_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM Equipment ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%machine%' AND purchase_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceData WHERE performance_metric = 'Temperature' ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, performance_value FROM Equipment INNER JOIN PerformanceData ON Equipment.equipment_id = PerformanceData.equipment_id WHERE PerformanceData.performance_metric = 'Pressure';
SELECT * FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Heavy Machinery';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' AND maintenance_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT equipment_name, performance_metric, performance_value FROM Equipment JOIN PerformanceData ON Equipment.equipment_id = PerformanceData.equipment_id WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31';

SELECT Equipment.equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id GROUP BY Equipment.equipment_name HAVING total_maintenance > 5 ORDER BY total_maintenance DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number, location FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, performance_metric FROM performance_data JOIN equipment ON performance_data.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, serial_number FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_schedule.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, image_type, date_taken FROM equipment INNER JOIN imaging_data ON equipment.equipment_id = imaging_data.equipment_id WHERE image_type = 'X-ray';
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'MRI';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer_name FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'X%' AND manufacturer_name = 'GE';
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer_name, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer_name IN ('Siemens', 'Philips') AND purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT equipment_type FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer_name FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'MRI'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC

SELECT technicians.technician_name, technicians.technician_specialty, maintenance_schedule.maintenance_type FROM technicians JOIN maintenance_schedule ON technicians.technician_name = maintenance_schedule.technician_name WHERE technicians.technician_experience_years > 5
SELECT equipment.equipment_name, performance_metric, performance_value FROM performance_data JOIN equipment ON equipment.equipment_id = performance_data.equipment_id WHERE performance_value > 80
SELECT equipment_name, test_type, test_result FROM equipment JOIN imaging_tests ON equipment.equipment_id = imaging_tests.equipment_id WHERE equipment_name = 'X-ray machine'
